texts.Brand:Name: DOGAN CONSULT
texts.Brand:Tagline: Engineering Resilient Connectivity for Critical Infrastructure
texts.Meta:Description: DOGAN CONSULT - Engineering-driven ICT & telecommunications consulting for government, utilities, and enterprise clients. Secure, efficient infrastructure solutions.
texts.Meta:Keywords: ICT consulting, telecommunications engineering, cybersecurity, data center design, critical infrastructure, government IT
texts.Footer:Description: Engineering Resilient Connectivity for Critical Infrastructure. Your trusted partner for secure, efficient ICT solutions. Supporting Vision 2030.

texts.Home:Hero:Subtitle: For Critical Infrastructure
texts.Home:Hero:Description: Specialized ICT consulting for telecommunications, cybersecurity, and digital infrastructure. Supporting Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 digital transformation. Trusted by government ministries and critical infrastructure operators.

texts.Home:Title: DOGAN CONSULT - Engineering Resilient Connectivity for Critical Infrastructure
texts.Home:Headline: Engineering Resilient Connectivity for Critical Infrastructure
texts.Home:Positioning: For government and large enterprises needing resilient communications systems, DOGAN CONSULT is the engineering-driven consultancy that delivers secure, efficient ICT infrastructure.
texts.Home:SubDescription: Combining deep technical expertise with trusted project leadership to solve your toughest connectivity challenges.
texts.Home:Services:Title: Comprehensive ICT Engineering Services
texts.Home:Services:Subtitle: End-to-end solutions for critical infrastructure—from network design to cybersecurity protection
texts.Home:Services:Telecom:Title: Telecommunications Engineering
texts.Home:Services:Telecom:Desc: End-to-end network design and deployment. We plan and engineer fiber-optic, broadband and wireless networks for reliable, high-speed infrastructure.
texts.Home:Services:DataCenter:Title: Data Center Design
texts.Home:Services:DataCenter:Desc: Full-lifecycle data center consulting. Master planning, architecture, systems integration and optimization for resilient, efficient facilities.
texts.Home:Services:Cyber:Title: Cybersecurity Consulting
texts.Home:Services:Cyber:Desc: Protecting critical infrastructure with security expertise. Risk assessments, compliance alignment, threat monitoring and incident response.
texts.Home:Services:Governance:Title: ICT Program Governance
texts.Home:Services:Governance:Desc: Governance and oversight to ensure project success. Strategic planning, governance frameworks, and program management excellence.
texts.Home:Industries:Title: Deep Domain Expertise in Critical Sectors
texts.Home:Industries:Subtitle: We understand the unique challenges and regulatory requirements of mission-critical industries
texts.Home:Industries:Gov:Title: Government & Public Sector
texts.Home:Industries:Gov:Desc: Government ministries, general authorities, and public sector entities requiring highly secure and NCA-compliant communications. Transportation, defense, and public safety systems aligned with Vision 2030.
texts.Home:Industries:Telecom:Title: Telecommunications
texts.Home:Industries:Telecom:Desc: Carriers and network operators deploying fiber, 5G/IoT infrastructure. Engineering partners for efficient, future-proof networks.
texts.Home:Industries:Utilities:Title: Utilities & Energy
texts.Home:Industries:Utilities:Desc: Electric, water, and gas utilities relying on SCADA and smart grid systems. Robust ICT and cybersecurity for grid modernization.
texts.Home:Industries:Infra:Title: Critical Infrastructure
texts.Home:Industries:Infra:Desc: Transport (rail, airports), data centers, and industrial facilities where uninterrupted connectivity is vital for essential services.
texts.Home:WhyUs:Title: Trusted Leaders in Enterprise ICT Solutions
texts.Home:WhyUs:Subtitle: What sets DOGAN CONSULT apart as your engineering-driven consultancy partner
texts.Home:WhyUs:Expertise:Title: Deep Engineering Expertise
texts.Home:WhyUs:Expertise:Desc: Decades of experience designing and implementing critical infrastructure. Our expert engineers partner with agencies to meet the toughest connectivity challenges.
texts.Home:WhyUs:Security:Title: Security & Compliance First
texts.Home:WhyUs:Security:Desc: Alignment with NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL, ISO 27001, and Saudi regulatory standards. We fortify systems against cyber threats while ensuring full compliance.
texts.Home:WhyUs:Partnership:Title: Trusted Partnership
texts.Home:WhyUs:Partnership:Desc: We work as your strategic partner, not just a vendor. Our solutions align with your mission goals while delivering measurable outcomes.
texts.Home:WhyUs:E2E:Title: End-to-End Solutions
texts.Home:WhyUs:E2E:Desc: From strategic planning through deployment and optimization. We design and secure your networks end-to-end, ensuring high availability.
texts.Home:WhyUs:Track:Title: Proven Track Record
texts.Home:WhyUs:Track:Desc: 500+ successful projects across government, utilities, and enterprise. Our case studies demonstrate consistent delivery excellence.
texts.Home:WhyUs:Innovation:Title: Innovation Focus
texts.Home:WhyUs:Innovation:Desc: We leverage emerging technologies (AI, IoT, 5G) to future-proof your infrastructure. Innovation balanced with reliability and security.
texts.Home:Testimonial:Quote: As a trusted ICT advisor, DOGAN CONSULT streamlines deployments and fortifies systems against cyber threats. Their solutions align with our Vision 2030 objectives and NCA regulatory requirements.
texts.Home:Testimonial:Title: Chief Technology Officer
texts.Home:Creds:Title: Industry Certifications & Partnerships
texts.Home:Creds:Subtitle: Recognized expertise backed by leading industry certifications
texts.Home:CTA:Title: Ready to Secure Your Critical Infrastructure?
texts.Home:CTA:Subtitle: Schedule a consultation with our expert engineers to discuss your ICT and telecommunications needs. We'll help you build resilient, compliant, and future-ready infrastructure.
texts.Home:Insights:Title: Thought Leadership
texts.Home:Insights:Subtitle: Expert perspectives on ICT infrastructure, cybersecurity, and digital transformation
texts.Home:Insights:WP:Title: Securing SCADA Systems in Modern Utilities
texts.Home:Insights:WP:Desc: Best practices for protecting operational technology in the era of connected infrastructure.
texts.Home:Insights:Guide:Title: 5G Network Planning for Government Agencies
texts.Home:Insights:Guide:Desc: Strategic considerations for deploying next-generation wireless in mission-critical environments.
texts.Home:Insights:Case:Title: Data Center Modernization Success Story
texts.Home:Insights:Case:Desc: How we helped a major utility achieve 40% energy savings while improving resilience.

texts.Public:About:Title: About Us - DOGAN CONSULT
texts.Public:About:Headline: About Us
texts.Public:About:MissionDesc1: DOGAN CONSULT is an engineering consultancy specializing in ICT, working with government sectors, utilities, and large enterprises to deliver secure and reliable infrastructure solutions.
texts.Public:About:MissionDesc2: We believe that ICT infrastructure is the backbone of critical operations. Therefore, we focus on engineering excellence, quality, and security in every project we undertake.
texts.Public:About:Value1:Title: Engineering Excellence
texts.Public:About:Value1:Desc: We commit to the highest quality standards in every project
texts.Public:About:Value2:Title: Security First
texts.Public:About:Value3:Title: Partnership
texts.Public:About:Value3:Desc: We work as a trusted partner to achieve our clients' goals
texts.Public:About:ExperienceDesc: With decades of experience in ICT engineering, we have executed complex projects for government sectors, utilities, and large enterprises.
texts.Public:About:Exp1: Design and deployment of large-scale fiber optic networks
texts.Public:About:Exp3: Comprehensive cybersecurity programs for critical infrastructure
texts.Public:About:Exp4: ICT program governance for large enterprises
texts.Public:About:BackgroundDesc: Our team consists of professional engineers with deep expertise in:
texts.Public:About:CTADesc: Contact us to discuss how we can help you

texts.Public:Services:Title: Services - DOGAN CONSULT
texts.Public:Services:Headline: Our Services
texts.Public:Services:Subtitle: Integrated engineering solutions for critical infrastructure
texts.Public:Services:Telecom:Title: Telecommunications Engineering
texts.Public:Services:Telecom:Desc: Comprehensive network design and deployment from strategic planning and licensing to site design and integration.
texts.Public:Services:Telecom:FullDesc: We plan and design fiber optic and high-speed wireless communication networks - from strategic routing and licensing to site design and integration - to build reliable, high-speed infrastructure.
texts.Public:Services:DataCenter:Title: Data Center Design
texts.Public:Services:DataCenter:Desc: Full-lifecycle data center consulting. We provide master planning, architecture, integration, and optimization to create resilient and efficient facilities.
texts.Public:Services:Cyber:Title: Cybersecurity Consulting
texts.Public:Services:Cyber:Desc: Protecting critical infrastructure with security expertise. Services include risk and gap assessments, cybersecurity program development, and governance and compliance.
texts.Public:Services:Cyber:Point3: Governance and compliance (NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL)
texts.Public:Services:Cyber:Benefit1: Protect critical infrastructure from cyber attacks
texts.Public:Services:Governance:Title: ICT Program & Delivery Governance
texts.Public:Services:Governance:Desc: Governance and oversight to ensure project success. We help clients align IT investments with business goals through governance frameworks, strategic planning, and program management.
texts.Public:Services:Governance:Benefit1: Align IT investments with business goals
texts.Public:Services:Governance:Benefit2: Allocate resources to most important projects

texts.Public:Industries:Title: Industries - DOGAN CONSULT
texts.Public:Industries:Headline: Industries We Serve
texts.Public:Industries:Subtitle: Deep expertise in critical sectors
texts.Public:Industries:Gov:Title: Government & Public Sector
texts.Public:Industries:Gov:Desc: We work with Saudi government ministries, general authorities, and public sector entities in transportation, defense, and public safety that require highly secure and NCA-compliant communication systems supporting Vision 2030 objectives.
texts.Public:Industries:Gov:ExpDesc: We have extensive experience working with the government sector, understanding the unique requirements of government agencies in terms of security, compliance, and reliability.
texts.Public:Industries:Telecom:Title: Telecommunications Companies
texts.Public:Industries:Telecom:Desc: We work with telecom companies and network operators deploying fiber, 5G, and IoT infrastructure.
texts.Public:Industries:Telecom:ExpDesc: The telecommunications market is constantly growing (expected ~12% annual growth) driven by demand for stronger connectivity and advanced networks. We are engineering partners for designing efficient, future-ready networks.
texts.Public:Industries:Utilities:Title: Utilities & Energy
texts.Public:Industries:Utilities:Desc: We work with electricity, water, and gas utilities that rely on SCADA systems and smart grids. This critical infrastructure needs robust ICT and cybersecurity consulting.
texts.Public:Industries:Utilities:ExpDesc: Utilities and energy need robust ICT and cybersecurity infrastructure to protect operations. We provide engineering oversight for grid modernization and industry standards compliance.
texts.Public:Industries:Infra:Title: Critical Infrastructure Operators
texts.Public:Industries:Infra:Desc: Transportation (rail, airports), data centers, and industrial facilities where uninterrupted connectivity is vital.
texts.Public:Industries:Infra:ExpDesc: These organizations need secure and resilient systems for essential services. We provide custom-designed solutions to ensure uninterrupted connectivity and comprehensive protection.
texts.Public:Industries:CTATitle: Want to learn more about our expertise in your industry?
texts.Public:Industries:CTADesc: Contact us to discuss your specific needs

texts.Public:Pricing:Title: Pricing - DOGAN CONSULT
texts.Public:Pricing:Headline: Pricing
texts.Public:Pricing:Subtitle: Custom solutions for your needs
texts.Public:Pricing:CustomDesc: We provide consulting solutions designed specifically for your needs
texts.Public:Pricing:CustomBoxDesc1: At DOGAN CONSULT, we believe every client is unique with specific needs. Therefore, we provide custom consulting solutions designed specifically for your projects and goals.
texts.Public:Pricing:CustomBoxDesc2: We work with you to develop a consulting proposal that fits your project scope, budget, and timeline. Whether you need a short consultation or a long-term consulting program, we're here to help.
texts.Public:Pricing:ModelsDesc: We offer flexible collaboration models to suit your needs
texts.Public:Pricing:Plan1:Title: Limited Consultation
texts.Public:Pricing:Plan2:Title: Comprehensive Consultation
texts.Public:Pricing:Plan3:Title: Strategic Partnership
texts.Public:Pricing:CustomNote: All solutions are customizable according to your needs. Contact us to discuss your project details.
texts.Public:Pricing:CTADesc: Contact us to discuss your needs and get a custom quote
